Uses of Package
nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions

  • Packages that use nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures
    Contains the more complex datastructures needed for the operation of the Neon library.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models
    Simple geometric models for use by the library.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs
    Several ready-to-apply generic graph models.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders
    GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.text
    Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.text.jogampexperimental
    Some poorly-annotated code generated by the JogAmp community for text rendering in JOGL.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.textures
    The packages needed for texturing objects in the world.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures 
    Class and Description
    UninitializedException
    Exception thrown when a component that needed initialization was used without doing so beforehand.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.exceptions used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.math 
    Class and Description
    InverseNotAvailableException
    Exception thrown when the inverse matrix calculation fails.
